common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"user_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a user."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by(depends on different APIs) partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token,  user_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm."}]
define: Get performance data for products linked with individual post Shopee Video. There is at least a one-day delay.
params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The start index of request. Starting from 1.

","name":"page_no","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"xGEznGb"},{"description":"

The number of item returned by this request. Max is 20.

","name":"page_size","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"feRwAcf"},{"description":"

The unique identifier for post Shopee Video.

","name":"post_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":"True","key":"FmyHwBF"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

","name":"item_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"nZKsCDF"},{"description":"

Name of the item.

","name":"item_name","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"BNRQRbe"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"iNsDkWk"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KYEAMGa"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"2af852cd-7420-4714-b7cd-33317f6fe548","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ZBrGYPS"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"sPhmKF","children":[{"description":"

The list of item that match the condition.

","name":"list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"YapSFmY","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. 

","name":"shop_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"HKSiNP"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

","name":"item_id","sample":"34002","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"PEBQaGJ"},{"description":"

Name of the item.

","name":"item_name","sample":"seller discount","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WXtrZKP"},{"description":"

Cover image url of the item.

","name":"item_cover_image_url","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jYZpSxJ"},{"description":"

Description of the item.

","name":"item_description","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"AckCQsQ"},{"description":"

Like count the post Shopee Video.

","name":"likes","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"JxnzCme"},{"description":"

Comment count the post Shopee Video.

","name":"comments","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"nYjpzj"},{"description":"

Amount of product orders from the video.

","name":"placed_orders","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"cjjJnks"},{"description":"

Amount of product sales from the video.

","name":"placed_sales","sample":"2.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"SSPWHxZ"},{"description":"

Buyers of the product in the video.

","name":"unique_buyers","sample":"2","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"ZbMkwmK"},{"description":"

Amount of products sold from the video.

","name":"sold_items","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"xKrDzYk"},{"description":"

Amount of product clicks from the video.

","name":"product_clicks","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"CrHeHYJ"},{"description":"

Amount of product clicks from the video/Product view from video.

","name":"product_click_rate","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"WjssQaP"},{"description":"

Amount of products sold from the video/amount of views from the video.

","name":"conversion_rate","sample":"1.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"JpDPpEw"},{"description":"

Amount of product sales from the video/amount of product orders from the video.

","name":"sales_per_order","sample":"2.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"HHeyddP"},{"description":"

Amount of product sales from the video/amount of buyers from the video.

","name":"sales_per_buyer","sample":"2.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"QESaJcm"}]},{"description":"

The total count of video that match the condition.

","name":"total_count","sample":"10","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"zJNdjWR"},{"description":"

This is to indicate whether the video list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of data.

","name":"has_more","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"eCQyQiY"}]}]}
